fields.name: Memento Mori:
fields.value: Attack a player with your Attack Power. If they die and you are aligned with you, they may still use (Non-Killing) abilities at night. (with their score equal to their final score before dying) In addition, one of their alive town Neighbors' (players above and below them on the player list) are poisoned (their ability silently fails, investigative abilities may be told false information.)
